home.logo_alt: Ikirango cya Mount Meru SoyCo Rwanda
home.title: Gushoboza u Rwanda n'Ibicuruzwa by'Imbuto za Soja by'Umwuga
home.subtitle: Koroshya ibikorwa byawe hamwe na dashiboro yacu y'itehnologiya, yagenewe kubika neza no gukora.

features.title: Kuki Uhitamo Mount Meru SoyCo?
features.sustainability_desc: Twiyemeje gukora ibicuruzwa bya soja mu buryo butishyira ibidukikije mu kaga.
features.efficiency_desc: Wongere ubushobozi bwawe mu guha ibicuruzwa hamwe n'ibarurishamibare ry'igihe nyacyo.
features.community_desc: Gushoboza abahinzi b'ahantu no gushyira imbaraga mu muryango mu buryo burambye.

cta.title: Witeguye Guhindura Imikorere Yawe?
cta.subtitle: Injira muri Mount Meru SoyCo Rwanda ukoreshe ibikoresho by'itehnologiya kugira ngo ushobore.

footer.about_desc: Mount Meru SoyCo Rwanda itanga ibicuruzwa bya soja by'umwuga ifite intego yo gukora neza no guhangana.
